sectionLeader.title: Global Leader in Conversion Rate Optimization and User Experience Optimization

sectionFounderVideos.title: Watch our founders share actionable CRO tactics straight from the stage

sectionClientVideos.title: Our Clients About the Results We Deliver

sectionCompare.title: vs other CRO agencies vs in-house team

guarantee.title: Guarantee of project success
guarantee.crs: We are the only CRO agency we know of that commits to an agreed-upon revenue metrics uplift. Our guarantees are based on our track record of results for clients
guarantee.other: Most other agencies lack the capacity to deliver guaranteed results and effectively manage the uncertainties of CRO projects
guarantee.inHouse: In-house teams typically are not required to demonstrate monthly uplifts in key revenue metrics for continued investment. We, on the other hand, are required to perform on a monthly basis

roi.title: ROI from CRO project
roi.crs: We guarantee an agreed-upon result, making it easy for our clients to calculate the ROI of a CRO project with us
roi.other: Other CRO agencies typically do not commit to specific results, making ROI uncertain
roi.inHouse: In-house teams often yield lower ROI due to KPI bias, full staffing costs, and lack of competence in CRO

cost.title: Cost of project
cost.crs: Our prices are typically 20-30% lower than those of top US and UK based agencies, thanks to our cost-efficient remote team structure in Europe
cost.other: Other leading CRO agencies in the US and Europe typically charge 30-40% more for their services without guaranteeing results
cost.inHouse: In-house CRO teams bear the full cost of employing professionals with the skills required for continuous revenue metrics improvement. Typically, this cost is four times higher than hiring a CRO agency

team.title: Access to comprehensive CRO/UXO team
team.crs: Enjoy full access to our expansive multidisciplinary team of over 50 professionals, skilled in 9 essential CRO and UXO competencies, each with years of specialised experience
team.other: A comprehensive CRO team includes 9 roles such as data analyst, UX researcher, CRO strategist, and A/B test developer. Most agencies don't have all these roles covered, relying on the client to fill the gaps
team.inHouse: In-house teams are typically constrained by internal resources and existing expertise, limiting their capability to deliver continuous growth and often hitting a glass ceiling

additionalTools.title: Additional cost of tools and technology
additionalTools.crs: You get full access to our proprietary developed tools essential for a successful CRO project, including tools for A/B testing, user surveys, user testing, QA, and more
additionalTools.other: Most agencies pass the cost of the additional tools required for a CRO project to clients, requiring them to subscribe to these tools
additionalTools.inHouse: Significant upfront investment in tools, with the need for regular updates and maintenance
